Title: The Making of 'Absence of Malice'
Actors: Luther Adler, Bob Balaban, Wilford Brimley, Melinda Dillon
Plot: An in-depth, behind-the-scenes look at the making of this Oscar-nominated film about an innocent man and a newspaper reporter being used by a manipulative prosecuter looking for a lead in his murder investigation. Includes interviews with stars Paul Newman and Sally Field, as well as director Sydney Pollack.
